rooms.description: North facing entrance hall as per Vastu, inviting positive energy. It features a modest reception area with traditional Chettinad-style decor.

Open-plan living and kitchen space designed in a single continuous layout with ample natural light from south-facing windows. The design incorporates Chettinad architectural elements such as carved wood details.
Spacious master bedroom with built-in storage and traditional wooden accents following Chettinad design principles. A dedicated balcony overlooks the garden.
Cozy child bedroom designed with simple yet elegant Chettinad detailing and natural ventilation.
Secondary child bedroom incorporating modern comforts while adhering to traditional Chettinad aesthetics.
Well-ventilated bathroom located near the master bedroom. Vastu guidelines ensure proper placement of water-related amenities.
Guest room with comfortable seating and traditional Chettinad decor to provide a warm welcome.
Compact study or home office designed for productivity with natural lighting and traditional Chettinad motifs.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligning with the north-facing Vastu principles to invite positive energy.
Large window in the living area for maximum sunlight and ventilation. Placement respects Chettinad architectural style.
Additional windows in guest room and study to ensure cross-ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.

vastu_considerations: North facing entrance to enhance positive energy flow.
South-east positioning of the open-plan kitchen and living area for optimal sunlight.
Balanced room placements to maintain harmony in accordance with Vastu Shastra.
chettinad_style_features: Intricate wood carvings on door frames and window sills.
Traditional Chettinad color palettes including deep reds, earthy browns, and rich gold accents.
Ornamental detailing in arches and pillars.
Use of local materials to ensure sustainability and authenticity.
